episodes.title: (Canada,1977) Canadian Cult That Shocked the World
episodes.description:
Discover the chilling true story of the Ant Hill Kids, a secretive Canadian cult led by Roch Thériault in the 1970s and 80s. What began as a search for spiritual salvation quickly spiraled into a brutal nightmare of control, abuse, and violence hidden deep in the Quebec wilderness. This documentary-style recount dives into the dark realities behind the cult’s rise and fall, revealing how faith turned into fear and one man’s twisted vision destroyed countless lives.

#truecrime #truehorror #documentary
